Bone Age App Description

Brief:
The "Bone Age" app, developed by Javier S√°nchez Hern√°ndez, serves as a powerful tool for healthcare professionals. Grounded in academic research, it enables pediatricians to estimate the bone age of young patients through visual assessments of radiographic images. Utilizing the insights from a doctoral thesis and published research, this app simplifies the evaluation process, making it an essential resource in pediatric healthcare.
